## Dot Density Map - Chickens

Source: <a href="https://livestock.geo-wiki.org/Application/index.php">Livestock Geo Wiki</a>


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}

chicken_livestock_df <- read.csv("archetypes/livestock-chicken-normalized.csv", header = TRUE)

chicken_livestock_df$x <- round(chicken_livestock_df$x, digits=4)
chicken_livestock_df$y <- round(chicken_livestock_df$y, digits=4)

chicken_livestock_df

```



```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=6}

theme_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "none",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text = element_blank(),
  axis.line = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  axis.title = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
)

# PLOT NATURAL EARTH BORDERS
ne_world <- ne_countries(scale = "small", returnclass = "sf")
# class(ne_world)

# removes Antarctica
ne_world <- filter(ne_world, iso_a3 != "ATA") 

v1 <- ggplot(data = ne_world) +
  geom_sf(fill="#d5d8d0", color="#a7aeb2", stroke=0.25) +
  geom_raster(data = chicken_livestock_df,
              aes(x = x, y = y, fill = BIN, alpha = BIN) ) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values =  c("#fcd75c", "#f6c247", "#f5af34", "#e39526", "#c46e29", "#a54d24", "#872c1b", "#690b0d"), guide = "none") +
  scale_alpha_manual(values =  c(0.9, 0.9, 0.9, 0.9, 0.9, 0.9, 0.9, 0.9), guide = "none") +
  coord_sf() +
  theme_opts +
  labs(title = "Tastes Like Chicken",
         subtitle = "Chicken per KM^2",
         caption = "Livestock Geo-Wiki"
       )

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 13, height_svg = 7,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0)))

```
